Overrated. Maybe it was good for the time... but now wrong-way-achieved difficulty makes the game suck ass. Enemies take too much shots and soldier's aim is far too perfect. Good games usually offer you two kind of tactics (sometimes both): use stealth to avoid the deadly, istant bullets of your opponents or to go Rambo and dodge whatever they throw at you. Usually not bullets because they are istant and cant be dodged (serious sam). In half-life the corridor map (wich doesn't HAVE to be bad) doesn't let you use stealth and the bullets can't be dodged. The result is that in good games, the more you're good the less damage you take. Damn, in SS if you are VERY good you can even set the maximum difficulty and don't lose even 1 HP. In half life, it doesn't matter how good you are, you are going to take those shots. That's why i love games like serious sam where you can dodge everything.  Game design wasn't even that bad.

No me encanta el juego, siento que recae un poco en la suerte en ciertas partes, y no ha envejecido muy bien que digamos, pero aun así es un juego revolucionario, coon mucho cuidado y cariño puesto en su creación, Half-Life 2 es mucho mejor, pero aun así vale la pena jugar el juego que lo inicio todo, como  no esta tan caro lo recomiendo ampliamente. Pero si no eres muy fanático de los juegos viejos, tal vez deberías saltarte este y mejor jugar la secuela.

Difficult enough to keep me interested, good physics, decent story, and the graphics are good for the age of the game. Definitely worth it.

No doubt this game was incredible for its time, but I can't help but feel some of the mechanics are flawed, even for its time period. The movement feels like you're constantly sliding across a block of ice, boxes are a pain in the ass to move around, and ladders, just $&%@ ladders. The gameplay over all is decent, fire fights often become annoying and every now and then I would have a save where I would spawn, immidiatly be killed, and then spawn again, forcing me to load to a previous save. I reccomend this game, simply because it is a classic game. If you are a pc gamer, you should play it, just to experince a little piece of gaming history.

Легенда игровой индустрии, что тут ещё можно сказать. Даже сейчас игра выглядит весьма неплохо, играть в неё до сих пор интересно, и она значительно лучше большей части выходящих сейчас игр, несмотря на то, что вышла в далёком 1998 году. Лично мне не понравился только последний уровень в мире Зен, он до невозможности скучный, глупый и запутанный. Такое чувство, что разработчики добавили его лишь для того, чтобы увеличить время прохождения на лишние пару часиков, но он всё равно не портит впечатления от прохождения. Интересные враги, красочные локации, большое разнообразие оружия оставляют неизгладимое впечатление. Больше всего мне понравилось бродить по помещениям Black Mesa, где частенько бывало страшно и жутко. 10/10

Bueno, a ver... ¿Que se puede decir que no se haya dicho de Half-Life, ademas de ser el juego que lo inició todo?

Half-Life no solo es un gran juego, es EL JUEGO por excelencia. Sin Half-Life no existe Counter-Strike, no existe DOTA, no existe TF2, ni Fortnite, ni Valorant, ni PUBG, ni Battlefield, ni Call of Duty. NO EXISTE NADA, No existe el gaming como lo conocemos hoy día. La industria de los videojuegos y del entretenimiento digital le deben la vida a Valve y su obra magna.

Es un clásico que no envejece. Es una plataforma para modders que sigue activa hasta la fecha. Es un referente indiscutido de los FPS. Es el mejor juego de todos los tiempos que, además, posee una de las mejores remakes jamas hechas sobre un videojuego: Black Mesa, de Crowbar Collective 

El año que viene cumplirá 25 años. Una media vida para algunos o una vida completa para otros. Para mí, una parte de mi vida.
No question, one of the best games of all time.
I love this game. I just bought it for the summer sale and I'm captivated. I am a big fan of great graphics but this game has my pulse going. A+
Um ótimo jogo, te faz compreender a história de Half-Life.

Un juego que sin duda deja corto a muchos actuales en cuanto a la trama argumental, llena de suspenso y buena parte de ciencia ficción. No defraudará a las nuevas generaciones que les guste probar algo "antiguo" pero que con toda seguridad se sorprenderán de lo bien trabajada de la historia y los diversos y oscuros mapas que trae consigo este juego, que, en muchos casos, son literalmente fuera de este mundo.

Además de tener una larga lista de servidores en internet para poder jugar el multiplayer que ya viene incluido.

Conclusión: Para los que crecimos con este pedazo de juego y para los que apenas lo van a conocer. Historia y multiplayer divertidos para pasar más de un buen rato y para sacarse el estrés matando a base de bichos a unos cuantos amigos en el trayecto.
EPIC GAME

Now many people criticize Half Life for being overhyped, outdated, grandfatherly gaming, but I on the other hand praise it. I love the game with a burning passion and will never quit loving it. It's fun, there's no getting around it. The story is strong and interesting whilst not to boring or dragged on, it's got a wonderful protagonist whose emotions can be played out by the player him/herself, and overall it's an entertaining experience. So get those 1990's posters up and grab a cold coke, because this game is a ledgend and I doubt you'll stop playing until it's done.

That moment when barnacle pulled me out of water after fight with ichtyosaur in „Forget about Freeman!” chapter is – as for now – the closest moment in my almost-20-year life for getting a heart attack. I put into that creature whole magazine of Glock (even though I knew it dies after 4 hits), went few metres away and thought that I really can't play this game anymore. I had to turn it off. That „anymore” lasted about 4 days, then I sat again to Half-Life. Unfortunately, I didn't know how to pass teleport part in Lambda Core, scientist kept getting killed… Anyway, it was when I didn't know anything about HL. I knew only that it is the best game I've ever played. A couple of years later I made a Steam Account, bought HL Complete Pack, L4D2, L4D1 (which overpassed HL in best game ever played) and other games, but still Half-Life has reserved place on my HDD. Even if I'm not playing it now anyway, it deserves it. Great story, astonishing gameplay, thrilling, but not too scary overview.

In nutshell: Not playing HL1 will be your biggest mistake as FPS player.

I didn't play this game when it was first released. I only played it recently so I am not recommending it based on nostalgia, I am recommending it because it was the most fun I had in an FPS in a while.

Story:

This game is not about the story. There are no cut scenes and barely any dialogue. Most of the story is in the background and doing some research and some exploring can reveal quite an interesting world. However you will most likely never notice all these details on your first play through. This game is about the gameplay, not the story.

Gameplay:

Like I said, this is one of the most fun FPS games I have played. There is pretty good enemy variety and a nice reange of weapons to choose from. The pacing is very fast in the combat sections, the fun part is to keep moving and kill enemies as fast as possible before they drain your health. When you blast through an area, barely giving the enemies enough time to think before you blow them up with these satisfying-to-use weapons, it feels great. 
There are also a few physics puzzles but they are very basic.

Graphics:

Obviously the game is very old but it still looks great. The basic graphical style gives the game a nice nostalgic feel for the way games used to look with their simple textures and effects. I also enjoy the graphics of old FPS because the levels are not cluttered and full of usless objects like todays FPS games. Without the ability to create giant set pieces and battles on an epic scale, the developers of this game were forced to focus on level design which this game is very good at.

Overall: 

A must play for fans of FPS games! I enjoyed this game more than Half Life 2 because of it's old school charm and fun run and gun gameplay in a memorable environment. I can see why this game was so popular back when it came out, it's still a great game even today.
Classic. Still holds up even after all these years.

I highly recommened you skip this version of Half-Life, This game is dated by the engine that it uses. The gameplay is fun and the story is minimalistic compared to modern shooters that tell you what is going on. If you want to play Half-Life for the story I recommend the Half-Life mod for Half-Life 2

Ottimo gioco. Gameplay ottimo con storia interessante e ben 16 ore di gioco assicurate. Molto bella la mescolanza tra sparatutto e gioco di abilità. Iterazione totale col mondo circostante, ogni singola cosa reagisce a voi, persino le macchinette delle bibite. Fantastico insomma.

Sicuramente non è un caso che Valve Software dal 1998 ad oggi non ha più sbagliato un colpo; Half Life rappresenta uno degli sparattutto migliori del periodo, con una grafica, un comparto sonoro ed una giocabilità sopra qualsiasi altro titolo uscito in quegli anni. La trama e l'atmosfera di gioco che sono riusciti a creare, senza dubbio, rappresentano i punti forza di questo FPS che è destinato a rimanere per tanto tempo ancora dentro le nostre menti.
Довольно интересная старенькая игрушка,даже можно сказать лучше большинства современных игр,есть что вспомнить)

This will never get old :)

What can I say? Half Life is a great FPS game that involves puzzle solving and some backtracking at times.

Gameplay:
Pretty diverse gamepaly, including shooting aliens, alien zombies and opposing human soldiers, solving evoirmental puzzles and observing your surroundings to maneuver the areas. Sometimes you are required to backtrack a little bit after completing certain tasks while visiting a lot of different kind of areas which also include some secret areas.
The  controls are all fine and feel responsive, and most of the guns are pretty darn solid and give a good enough feel.

Graphics:
For a game from 1998, you gotta admit the graphics are pretty solid, considering this came out only 6 years after Doom.

Music:
The music in this game includes mostly of ambience sound music, that only play at certain spots in the game to add extra atmosphere, which it does very good.

Story:
Half Life has a decent story, but doesn't really go in depth. Most of the story consists of the  areas you visit yourself, without much dialogue. The main character you play as doesn't talk at all, but is definately not a negative point.

Replayability:
You might wanna try playing it a second time if you really badly want to look around for some extra secret areas and stuff, but other than that, there's not much to it to re-live this game unless you want to feed your nostalgic hunger.

Over all:
A solid classic FPS game that in my opinion defines the better half of the FPS genre that does not play like a game on rails to go from point A to B.
It's the original Half-Life. Although it definitely shows its age in regards to the graphics, the design of the game is very well done and can hold its own in comparison to even today's shooters.

Скачал, решил вспомнить как я играл в неё когда мне было лет 6. А по существу игра наверное лучшая из тех что я проходил, захватывающий сюжет, отличная(для тех времен) графика, огромный выбор оружия, страшные монстры))

Это игра из первых в которые я поиграл и полюбил . Я настолько влюбился в эту серию игр , что  больше ничего не нравиться , ну не совсем конечно , но по сюжету  она лучшая  ! Ну вот и высказался . С нетерпением жду HL3

EL MEJOR JUEGO PARA UN GAMER

Lo positivo:

este juego me lo pase ya como mas de 5 veces y sigo queriendo mas, cada juego de esta saga parece un capitulo de The Walking Dead, el cual cada final te deja muchas ganas de saber que paso despues, es para mi el mejor juego de la historia y escencial para la vida de un gamer, para los malditos giles del CoD (ojo no todos) se quejan del juego, diciendo que es una mierda y que su puntuacion muy desactualizada......... para ser un juego del año 1998 PUES SIIIIII pero para su epoca era una renovacion en graficos hasta incluso en la historia del juego al estilo cine, la cantidad de misterio y las ganas de saber que ocurrio despues mantiene viva esta saga, lastima que Valve no lo vea asi y esta con su "fiebre" multijugador en donde la historia no tiene un punto definido como es en Left 4 Dead............ QUEREMOS HALF-LIFE 3 VALVEEEEE........... obvio que planear un gran fin de una gran saga es dificil :P pero parece que cada vez dejan su obra maestra en el olvido..... pero volvera ya lo veran...... hasta entonces ay que seguir reviviendo esta magnifica saga desde sus comienzos hasta sus expansiones (Opposing Force, Blues Shift y Decay) si no les gusto el juego o les falto todavia mas, pues para eso estan su infinito multijugador y sus cantidades masivas de mods con cada uno de ellos que llevan otras historias, incluso un juego al estilo Dragon Ball Z llamado ESF (Earth's Special Forces), ademas de su magnifico remake llamado "Black Mesa Source" que es este mismo juego pero con graficos actualizados, mayor argumento y algunas otras cosas distintas, ademas ES GRATIS, tienes que probarlo por si te encanto el 1 o por si quieres comenzar con esta gran saga con una "mejor calidad" pero ojo aun no esta terminado del todo, faltan sus niveles de Xen

Ahora lo negativo del juego:

el Half-Life de steam era distinto al que tenia antes, COF COF PIRATA COF COF, este de aqui es como una version mas actualizada y tiene algun que otro cambio en animacion y de la IA (un ejemplo el Ichitosaur de ahora es mas agresivo que antes TT--TT) no es que sea malo eso, es mas me encanta, pero le encontre muchos bugs :P por ejemplo: me quedo trabado en una esquina, en el capitulo Nucleo Lambda me ocurrio un error en una tuberia y el agua del nucleo no se lleno impidiendome pasar, etc. descartando todo eso el juego es MAGNIFICO yo lo veia como una mierda luego lo jugue y lo veo como la cosa mas grandiosa "jamas creada" (mas bien dicho "creada" ya que lo tenemos aqui) una de las mejores maravillas del mundo gamer demostrando que no todo son graficos

PD: si quieren una mejor experiencia jugando este magnifico juego, descarguense este increible pack que cambian los modelos por unos HD
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=271014050
